content:
The military of the Russian occupation army was struck by Kharkiv and settlements of Izium, Chuguevsky, Kupyansky, Kharkiv districts.

This is stated inmessageNational Police of Ukraine.

On March 30, 2024, at about 21:10, the enemy fired at Kharkiv. A 35-year-old man and a 77-year-old woman were injured. Damaged residential high -rise buildings, private cars.

On March 31, 2024, at about 00:35, the Russian Federation fired at the Hurricane RSSU village of Borova. A 19-year-old man was killed, a 27-year-old man was injured. Damaged apartment buildings, shop, private cars.

As reported by the Armyinform, fordataThe Air Force of the Armed Forces, on the night of March 31, 2024, the Russian invaders attacked 14 winged missiles X-101/X-555, 11 shaped UAVs, Iskander-M ballistic missile and a controlled X-59 aviation missile.

At the same time, Ukraine's air defense has shot down 9 winged missiles X-101/X-555 and 9 shock UAVs Shahd-136/131 Russian invaders.
title: In Kharkiv region, as a result of Russian shelling, a person was killed
description: This is stated in the message of the National Police of Ukraine. March 30, 2024 ...
author: Army Inform
